title: Crater in southern Terra Cimmeria
description: The sand dunes are the large, branched ridges and dark patches that are conspicuous against the bright background, particularly in the northwest corner of our picture. There are also signs of two other wind-related processes: smaller, brighter ridges line the floor of the crater in regularly spaced rows.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
